_header: Saint Nicholas was of great post
_description: A carol to St. Nicholas — seven irregular quatrains and burden: ‘Alle maydenis for godes grace / Worchepe ȝe seynt nicolas’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Seynt nicholas was of gret posteFor he worchepid maydenis
                    þre…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…& throw godes grace he xulde hem syndeHusbondes þre
                    good & hind[e]
